General.Name: Lighthouse Capital Ltd
General.Description: Lighthouse Properties plc invests in direct property, and listed real estate and infrastructure securities in France, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, and the United Kingdom. Its property portfolio includes retail assets. The company was formerly known as Lighthouse Capital Limited and changed its name to Lighthouse Properties plc in December 2021. Lighthouse Properties plc was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Sliema, Malta.

0.Name: Mr. Justin Jamer Muller C.A., C.A.I.A., C.F.A., CGMA
0.Title: CEO & Exec. Director
